name: Zeta Wing
overview: Zeta Wing is a fun vertical shoot-em-up for the Commodore 64, inspired by the arcade game Gemini Wing. Story: Strange mutant creatures have appeared across the surface of planet Earth! Earth needs a hero to stop them... one like you! So strap into your fighter and blast off to end this infestation for good! Features: 7 challenging stages, each with their own graphic style. 3 difficulty settings: Easy, Normal, Hard. Lots of parallax scrolling. 10 player weapon upgrades. 7 end of stage bosses. PAL and NTSC compatible. Simultaneous music and sound effects.
